p: Higher education can and should play an important role in raising awareness and shaping the attitudes and practices of the new generations toward actions on sustainability. The values and behaviors of university students with the sustainability agenda are important within the climate change context. There are some university initiatives that are known as greening the curriculum [ 39]. Chaplin and Wyton found that university students tend to accept the importance of sustainable living, yet their understanding is usually at a very low level and there is a shortage of actions [ 12]. It is critical to close the gap between knowledge, values, and actions [ 11].
